title: Possible Proof of the Riemann Hypothesis Resulting From Prediction of Exact Values of the Landau Constants
description:
reference: viXra:2211.0032v1
title: Possible Proof of the Riemann Hypothesis Resulting From Prediction of Exact Values of the Landau Constants
authors: Miroslav Sukenik
category: Number Theory
type: submission
date: 2022-11-05 02:05:15
abstract: Based on the predicted value of the Landau constants L = 0.5331588u2026.and A = 0.7301772..., it is possible to identify the critical line x=0.5 with the horizon line. It is known that the size of entropy is proportional to the size of the surface of the horizon, and according to the holographic principle, all information must lie on this surface. So also the zero points of the Riemann Zeta function, which carry information about the distribution of primenumbers.
